scene_description_enriched: The scene depicts a man, likely a prophet or saint, seated on a throne-like structure, wearing a green turban and a purple robe. He holds a scroll and a quill, appearing to be writing or dictating. Before him kneels an angel with white wings, dressed in white, holding a censer. The background features a patterned tapestry and architectural elements suggesting an interior space with arched windows and a vaulted ceiling. The overall composition suggests a divine revelation or inspiration.
